commands.name: az iot ops dataflow endpoint list
commands.summary: List dataflow endpoint resources associated with an instance.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops dataflow endpoint list --instance
                                  --resource-group
examples: az iot ops dataflow endpoint list --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops dataflow endpoint show
commands.summary: Show details of a dataflow endpoint resource.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops dataflow endpoint show --instance
                                  --name
                                  --resource-group
examples: az iot ops dataflow endpoint show -n myendpoint --in mycluster-ops-instance -g myresourcegroup
